summary: Provides functionality to load, preprocess, and format the QNLI (Question Natural Language Inference) dataset from the GLUE benchmark, converting raw records into structured examples, supplying training and development splits, mapping label identifiers to readable strings, and generating T5‑style prompted queries for model consumption.
business_intent: Facilitates the preparation of QNLI data for natural language inference model training and evaluation, streamlining dataset handling to accelerate development of question‑answer entailment systems.
